Work Services Careers Contact

Project

UBL Digital App

Client

United Bank Limited

Type

UI/UX, CX, Design System, Native Development

Attending to varying shifts in banking habits

In 2015, the UBL Digital App and O3 Interfaces came together to redefine mobile banking apps.

Online banking wasn't particularly handy initially. Despite the fact that we could access our bank accounts from anywhere in Pakistan, there were still reservations pertaining to user-orientation. This compelled people to lean on branch banking for support and accessibility. But that didn't sit well with us. We wanted to change that.

If we had online banking, why wasn't it living up to basic standards? We had the technology already, which meant all we needed to do was tailor it to consumer needs and phone function. We succeeded in our plans because we researched from a consumer's point of view and didn't give much weight to corporate requirements.

We wanted an inclusive design for a banking app that was accommodating, convenient, and simple to use for people of all ages. Most importantly, it had to not be boring. This banking app was intended to change the face of the game. This project was challenging yet equally rewarding. We needed to appeal to the younger generation while making sure we did not compromise the older ones.

Upgrading the user experience

The blend was perfect for the app. It combined minimalist design with advanced technology. It respected the vision and considered the reason they took on this project in the first place. Banking apps take our time. We worry about secure payment gateways, easy interfaces, and understanding where our money goes. It took us a while to get there, but we made it.

Clutter free, minimalist dashboard

Presenting essential financial information such as recent transactions and balance, thus personifying efficiency and simplicity.

Inclusivity
–– fostering a habitat

The UBL Digital app was designed with the consideration that it needs to be inclusive. A mobile banking app is a basic need for anyone, regardless of age. It's supposed to provide assistance, not confusion. The minute you tap on the app, you'll naturally feel it was created for you.

Safe. Air-tight. Swift.

Cut straight to the chase: Within a fraction of a second, log in via face ID or password and use the app accordingly.

Count Your Climate Impact

The UBL Digital App attempts to play a pivotal role in going green. Not only do you save paper, but you can now also visualize how much you're contributing to saving the planet.

Digital Onboarding

You can now open a bank account with just your fingerprint from the comfort of your home.

Design's more than what meets the eye - an earthy scent that warms the air after the first rain; the grip after having a hearty meal. That's our aim with tech-we don't want it to walk alone. It's good to have a friend beside you. Design is that-an upgrade.

Integrated powerful search engine, ensuring that users can swiftly find any feature or information within the app.

Provides curated themes, allowing users to customize their app interface for a personalized banking experience.

Settings to adjust UI animations for improved accessibility, catering to users with diverse preferences and needs.

Our challenge was twofold: improving performance while enhancing security. We carefully selected technology and architecture to meet these goals. This approach allowed us to innovate within our means, striving for better outcomes despite the obstacles.

An Anomaly in Pakistan: UBL Pay

You're in line at the supermarket and can't find your debit card. Hmm, that's a sticky position to be in. What are you going to do now? Simple. Take out your phone and use UBL Pay.

Biometric Verification

It's simple. It's proof of identity and life. You trust us with your money. It's our duty to go that extra mile to protect your means. This feature enables us to secure your account for you.

Digital Cheque Deposit

If you're getting at ease digitally, why not use it to your advantage? If you can't go to the bank today, there's no reason for you to amend your schedule for a simple visit. Deposit a check digitally wherever you are.

An Anomaly in Pakistan –– UBL Pay

UBL Pay allows you to make transactions without having your debit card on you. Once you've set up UBL Pay on your Android device, you can use this technology to pay anywhere with great convenience. UBL Pay is home to the Near Field Communication technology that allows the safe transfer of data from your phone to the payment terminal enabling secure transactions.

Biometric Verification

You don't need to visit a bank branch anymore to verify your existence. The App does that for you! Verify your account via your ID, scan your left and right hand and you're done!

Not only does this save you time, but it also reminds you that you're taken care of. The UBL Digital App looks after you and your money.

Digital Cheque Deposit

Have to visit a branch during the work week? Need to wait in line to deposit a cheque? Have to wait two days before checking your bank account because there's no cheque tracking available? Well, we're glad to be here because we've just made it all too easy.

With the digital cheque deposit feature, you can deposit up to 50 cheques a month, cash value of 5 million PKR. You can also now track your cheques to keep a count of their progress. It's all so convenient.

Wear Your Money on Your Sleeve

If you have an Apple or Android watch, you can add your banking app to it. This will make transactions easier all while providing you with the most crucial information on your watch.

You could be out on a walk or on your way from the gym. In your mind, it was a quick run, but what if you needed to get some things to go? That's where your watch comes in handy.

Expanding banking services to wearable technology was a step forward, enabling users to manage finances conveniently through their Apple Watch or Android watches offering customers more flexibility.

View project

A virtual showcase of innovation and sustainability

The virtual space on Spatial.io introduces UBL Digital App's banking channels, awards and features pertaining but not limited to car loans. This addition adds to the bank's drive to make banking easier for its consumers. The bank also keeps sustainability in mind.

View in Spatial
